title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 10.31 - Health of operators
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 10.31 - Health of operators

State Regulations

No person known to be affected with any communicable disease in an infectious stage shall engage in barbering or cosmetology and no person so affected shall be employed as a barber or cosmetologist. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
10.31

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
